articles.title: EXPLAINER: How vaccine passports for global travel will work - CTV News
articles.description: Keen to avoid losing another summer of holiday revenue to the coronavirus pandemic, the European Union, some Asian governments and the airline industry are scrambling to develop so-called COVID-19 vaccine passports to help kickstart international travel.
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
Boarding pass, suitcase, passport and ... digital vaccination certificate?

articles.title: Belarusian leader defends his action to divert flight - CBC.ca
articles.description: Belarus's authoritarian president on Wednesday defended his action to divert a European flight that triggered bruising European Union sanctions and accused the West of waging a "hybrid war" to "strangle" the ex-Soviet nation.

articles.title: Realme Narzo 30 5G launched with MediaTek Dimensity 700, 90Hz display, 5,000mAh battery: price, specs - 91mobiles
articles.description: Realme Narzo 30 5G price and specifications have been revealed in Europe. It looks like a rebranded Realme 8 5G, so we wonder whether the device will launch in India or not.
articles.content:
Realme Narzo 30 5G and Realme 8 5G share identical specifications, so it seems unlikely that the device will launch in India.

articles.title: Discovery of rare mushroom in northern B.C. a biology mystery - CBC.ca
articles.description: The rare and little-researched witches cauldron mushroom is typically found in northern Europe, where it's threatened and has been declining in recent decades.
articles.content:
A few weeks ago, while jumping logs and crossing creeks near northern B.C.'s Nechako River, hiker Cynthia Andal spotted something that stopped her in her tracks.
